metadata.dc:author: Guzmán Tirado, M G
metadata.dc:description: A bibliographical review is undertaken on dengue virus covering the period between 1952 and 1978 and including laboratory diagnosis aspects (viral isolation, serology, etc.), development of immunity and epidemiology.
metadata.dc:title: Dengue. II. Diagnóstico de laboratorio. Inmunidad. Epidemiología.
[Dengue. II. Laboratory diagnosis. Immunity. Epidemiology].
